meanings.definition: Grown or fused to a different part or organ.
meanings.sent1: The adnate petals of the flower were firmly attached to the stem.
meanings.sent2: The mushroom's adnate gills were closely connected to the cap.
meanings.sent3: The adnate leaves seemed to be hugging the branch tightly.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were adnate to the project, seamlessly blending in.
meanings.sent5: The adnate relationship between the two characters was evident in their actions.

meanings.definition: United or combined with another part or organ.
meanings.sent1: The adnate layers of the cake created a delicious combination of flavors.
meanings.sent2: The adnate roots of the trees intertwined underground.
meanings.sent3: The adnate puzzle pieces fit perfectly together, forming a complete picture.
meanings.sent4: Their adnate efforts resulted in a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The adnate colors of the painting blended harmoniously, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
